page.title: 04THE RECREATION GROUND
page.content: The Recreation Ground in the centre of Summercourt ,by the chapel and opposite the fair ground was given many years ago to the village by Mrs Thomas ,who owned the land. It is known locally as the"Rec" and is about 1 hectare in size,and is a well mown grass field. There are four swings ,a roundabout,a slide and it used to have three see-saws,but now only one works as the others are broken.At one end of the field is a football pitch with goal posts used for kick arounds by small groups. The school at one time used the Recreation Field for their sports but now have a field of their own. Some shrubs and decorative trees have been planted round the field edge but have not yet fully developed.
